translations: 有髓的，多髓的；精练的；简洁有力的

sentences.sentence: Many of them made a point of praising the film's pithy dialogue.
sentences.translation: 他们中有许多人称赞电影里简练的对话。

sentences.sentence: His pithy advice to young painters was, "Above all, keep your colours fresh."
sentences.translation: 他给年轻画家简明扼要的建议是，“至关重要的，要保持色彩鲜艳。”

sentences.sentence: To ERR is human; to forgive, divine, was the pithy view of Alexander Pope.
sentences.translation: 是人就会犯错，是神就会宽恕，这是亚历山大·蒲柏观点的精髓。
